attributes.additional_details:
Save The Ram Pub!

The Old Ram Coaching Inn is a listed inn dating back to the 17th Century - documents reveal that it has been a coaching inn for most of its life. It is now under threat by superstore Tescos. Pubs like The Ram are part of our English heritage and they are under threat. We are about to lose our identity as a country unless this stops!

We need to save our historic pubs! Save The Ram!
